name: СЛАВА УКРАЇНІ
description:
Glory To Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!

Be healthy, kozache!
Pass our game, answer all the questions and thereby prove that you are a real kozak,
and Bandera and batkivschyna can be proud of you. In the game you will be accompanied by a pleasant soundtrack to anyone.
post-Soviet ear, and familiar names, surnames and stories will brighten up your languid evening.

Features:
  • 87 questions that show you are dancing or Moskal.
  • The unique soundtrack, in the spirit of Russian folk hard bass
  • Questions about Stump, Legitimate and Green [/ list]

    GLORY TO UKRAINE!!!
